name: Xpunk Labs
description: XPUNK Labs is a Web3 gaming project that combines immersive cyberpunk aesthetics with blockchain functionality. It offers a decentralized gaming experience where players can earn rewards based on skill, gain governance rights, and maintain true ownership of in-game assets. All core features are powered by the native $XPUNK token, which supports transactions, participation in decision-making, and access to exclusive in-game utilities.
